duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the daily operations of the office, including receiving deliveries and maintaining inventory of office supplies.
Monitor and distribute incoming communications, such as emails, phone calls, and mail, ensuring timely and relevant responses or routing.
Collaborate with the Operations Administrative Associate to process organizational procurement.
Collate and code expense reports using the Expensify platform.
Support the grants team during the pre-award phase, assisting with assessments prior to awards being granted.
Monitor grants system to ensure active grants compliance, coordinating efforts with the grants team.
Monitor and troubleshoot day-to-day issues, promptly notifying grants team of compliance concerns.
Assist in maintaining the integrity of data through accurate input and ongoing data management tasks.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of Administrative Support experience, 1+ year of Grants Assistant experience, Proficiency with Expensify, Working knowledge of Spanish, French, or Portuguese, Experience with Sharepoint and Asana, Familiarity with issues relating to climate and biodiversity
